title: Canadian motorist unknowingly opens wrong Tesla but is allowed to drive away in it
description: A Canadian Tesla owner accidentally climbed into the wrong car and his app allowed him to drive away in the lookalike vehicle, the motorist said Tuesday.

title: DOJ and SEC launch probes into Silicon Valley Bank after collapse
description: The Department of Justice and Securities and Exchange Commission have opened investigations into last week's collapse of Silicon Valley Bank.

title: OpenAI releases GPT-4, artificial intelligence that can 'see'
description: OpenAI said Tuesday it was unveiling GPT-4, a new version of its artificial intelligence software.

title: Google introducing A.I. tools to Gmail and Docs as part of larger push
description: Google is deepening its push into generative artificial intelligence, introducing features Tuesday that will let users create text in Gmail and Docs using the company’s AI technology.

title: Senators seek answers from Pinterest following NBC News investigation
description: Pinterest added safety measures following an NBC News report that revealed men used the site to find photos of young girls. Senators are also seeking answers.

title: Meta to lay off 10,000 more workers after initial cuts in November
description: Meta will lay off 10,000 more workers and incur restructuring costs ranging from three to five billion dollars, the company announced Tuesday, with CEO Mark Zuckerberg warning that economic instability could continue for “many years.”
